description: Contents: Abū Bakr Muḥammad ibn Zakarīyā Rāzī, Fragments of al-Ṭibb al-Manṣūrī (ff. 1r-54r). Commentary on Johannitius with extracts from the text in an anonymous translation from Latin (ff. 54v-72v). Remedies and medicaments (ff. 73r-79r). Shem Tov ben Joseph Falaquera, Igeret ha-Ṿikuaḥ (fragment) (f. 79v). Treatise on medical astrology (ff. 80v-84v). Avicenna, Canon (Book I) (ff. 85r-131v).
title: Collection of texts on medicine
author: Rāzī, Abū Bakr Muḥammad ibn Zakarīyā
